en:
逆转
(Nìzhuǎn)

reverse

Definitions of 逆转
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    reverse
        逆转, 颠倒, 倒转, 批驳
    deteriorate
        恶化, 变质, 退化, 逆转
    become worse
        堕, 逆转
    take a turn for the worse
        逆转
